long_description: . Authors: Bob D'Antonio, Maryann Gaug, Stewart Green, Linda B. Mullally and Tracy Salcedo-Chourre; edited by Meredith Dias. Softcover; 269 pages; color photographs and maps. Morris Book Publishing LLC; copyright 2012. Hikes are accessible from the Denver metro area and across the state. Detailed lists outline what to bring to keep your pooch happy, healthy and hydrated on the trail. Includes tips on how to train your dog before the hike, as well as essential dog safety and preventative care information. Selection chart compares trails by leash regulations, difficutly level (easy/moderate and difficult/strenuous), and distance (less than 5 mi., 5 - 10 mi. and more than 10 mi.). .
short_description: Best Dog Hikes: Colorado provides information on over 50 Colorado hikes that will delight both you and your furry companion.
